name: Spikes and stones
description:
Objective: Cross the desert and find your way back home.

Hint: Try to get every object you can get---you will need it to maximize water supply.

Controls: The full game can be played with the mouse. Inside the scenes, WASD + Space Bar controls are also available. Toggle full screen with F11.

Credits:

A point-and-click mini-game designed and developed by Yasmina & Eduardo during Mini Jam 53. All assets were made by us within 72 hours, with the exception of the wind sound and the theme song (the latter being taken from free-of-copyright oroclick assets).

Made with Godot and Aseprite.

Post-jam update: Added Linux, Windows. Fixed major bug (which made the endgame unreachable) and added touch screen support.
